title: Bremmer: We are seeing reaction to refugee crisis in Italy
itunes:title: Bremmer: We are seeing reaction to refugee crisis in Italy
description:
Eurasia Group's Ian Bremmer weighs in on Italy's election and the refugee crisis on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
